name: Nothing+Nothing=
description:
How to play:

To start press LMB to place the "NOTHING" somewhere, this will unlock "NOTHING" in the TAB menu. By pressing TAB you can see already discovered items and spawn them by pressing on them with mouse. Select items with RMB and combine them by pressing Q. You can only combine 2 items but the result can spawn more than 1 item.

Controls:

- LMB - Pick up item with mouse

- RMB - Select item

- Q - Combine selected items (if possible)

- TAB - Open tab with discovered items (click to spawn them item)

- LMB+Drag - Move camera

- Delete - Remove item on mouse

- R - Restart scene (does not delete progress)

Other controls (usable later in the game):

- WSAD/Arrows - Movement

- Space - Attack
